entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
